(If you want any tips/help from me in terms of aim and or siege add me as a friend. I'll gladly help :) )

Great Great FPS aim trainer. That's what I mainly use it for, I'm currently plat 3 rank in Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege (only top 15% of players in the world are plat 3 in the game). It is excellent at getting rid of bad aiming habits, and developing better and move efficient aim. Everyday I play even just yprac bot arena custom map I get more and more kills in siege. and playing any multiplayer mode challenges my aim and is improving it on a day to say basis. If you're just getting into PC FPS or if you want to get your aim to that next level in your main game, then CSGO is a MUST!! Especially custom aim training maps. They are AMAZING!!!
